name: Intepat IP Services
overview:
Intepat IP Services is a niche Intellectual Property consulting firm providing services in a broad range of Intellectual Property matters, specializing in patent, trademark, and design. We offer a suite of leading-edge services in creation, protection and management of Intellectual properties. We provide tailored and cost effective approach to our clients ranging from Fortune 500 to SMEâ€™s to Individual Inventors and help our clients to turn their ideas and innovations into business opportunities. We emphasize business aspect of IP and urge our clients to take into account the dynamic interplay between business, legal and technical issues when making decisions about IP.

We have a team of experienced and well trained professionals specialising in IP matters to provide best consultative services for our domestic and international clients. We gained our legal skills, engineering talent, and understanding of our clientsâ€™ business by serving companies and organizations in their technology and intellectual property needs. Our clients are active in a broad variety of technical and scientific areas such as mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, physics, electronics, communication, computer science and material science.
